tool_description: Retrieves and consolidates financial information for a customer from multiple sources including financial statements, bank records, and payment history.

reporting_period_years.description: Number of years of historical data to collect (1-5)

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer identifier not found in system records.
Invalid data_sources: Must include at least one valid source from [financial_statements, bank_records, payment_history, tax_returns, trade_references].
Invalid reporting_period_years: Must be between 1 and 5 years.
Data access error: Unable to retrieve data from specified sources due to connectivity issues.
usage: Provide customer_id and specify data_sources array. Optionally set reporting_period_years to control historical data scope. The tool aggregates financial information from selected sources.

customer_id.description: The customer identifier used for data collection

collection_date.description: Date when data was collected in date-time format

revenue_history.description: Annual revenue figures for the reporting period

expense_history.description: Annual expense figures for the reporting period

data_completeness_score.description: Percentage score indicating completeness of collected data
